full_summary:
================================

# Tender Announcement: Epson Ink for IRCC

## Notice ID

SSC 2BP3-148531

## Solicitation Number
BPM019901/24285

## Tender Title
Epson Ink for IRCC (2BP3-148531)

## Tender Closing Date
Monday, November 06, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

## Contracting Entity
Shared Services Canada (SSC)
90 Metcalfe Street
Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K0A 0C3

## Scope of Work

Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) is seeking a bidder to supply and deliver Epson ink cartridges for its existing fleet of Epson WorkforcePro WF-5290 printers on an as-and-when-requested basis. The initial contract period is three (3) years with one (1) 12-month option period to extend the contract.

## Goods or Services
The tender involves the supply of up to 3,000 units of Epson ink cartridges to be delivered to IRCC on an as-and-when-requested basis using a Request on Contract (ROC). The bidder must ensure that the ink cartridges meet the required specifications and quality standards.

## Trade Agreements

This tender is open to bidders from Canada and/or its trading partners under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

## Tender Documents
The tender documentation is available on the Shared Services Canada Procurement and Contracting website at [insert website link].

## Contact Information
For any questions or clarifications, please contact:
Channary Luy
613-323-5347

## Expiry Date
Monday, November 06, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

Please ensure that your tender submission is received on or before the tender closing date. Late submissions will not be considered.
